name: Inside the Dungeon
description:
Travel to the depth of the dungeon before the darkness consumes you.

made for the Ramadan Development Nights,

You play as a knight traveling to the depth of the dungeon to escort a priestess to the depth.

You have 25 min to defeat the game, to unlock the final level you have to go through all 10 interactions with the Ember Maiden. then you go through the door to the last level

In Game Music
"Healing, Heavy Heart, Ether Vox"  are by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) and are
